text: The Teahouse of the August Moon is a 1956 American comedy movie directed by Daniel Mann and was based on the 1951 novel of the same name by Vern J. Sneider. It stars Glenn Ford, Marlon Brando, Paul Ford, Eddie Albert, Jun Negami, Machiko Ky≈ç and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1956 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies based on books Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Daniel Mann
title: The Teahouse of the August Moon (movie)
